TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit JumpList extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public NotInheritable Class JumpList Implements ISupportInitialize
.class public auto ansi sealed JumpList extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示作为菜单显示在 Windows 7 任务栏按钮上的项和任务的列表。

span.span: Represents a list of items and tasks displayed as a menu on a Windows 7 taskbar button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] 任务栏通过使用跳转列表，为直接从任务栏按钮启动程序提供了增强的功能。The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar provides enhanced functionality for starting programs directly from the taskbar button by using Jump Lists. "跳转列表" 也用于 [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] "开始" 菜单。Jump Lists are also used in the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] Start menu. 您可以通过右键单击任务栏按钮或单击 "开始" 菜单中的程序旁边的箭头来访问跳转列表。You access a Jump List by right-clicking a taskbar button or by clicking the arrow next to a program in the Start menu. 有关 "跳转列表" 的详细信息，请参阅 Windows 用户体验交互指南的 "[任务栏](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178478)" 部分。For more information about Jump Lists, see the [Taskbar](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178478) section of the Windows User Experience Interaction Guidelines. 类为 [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] 任务栏中的跳转列表功能提供托管包装，并管理传递到 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell 的数据。The class provides a managed wrapper for the Jump List functionality in the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar and manages the data passed to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell. 类公开的功能在 [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]之前的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 版本中不可用。The functionality exposed by the class is not available in versions of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] earlier than [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]. 使用 类的应用程序将在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]的其他版本中运行，但跳转列表将不可用。Applications that use the class will run in other versions of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)], but the Jump List will not be available. 有关 Windows shell 和本机跳转列表 Api 的详细信息，请参阅[任务栏扩展](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178479)。For more information about the Windows shell and native Jump List APIs, see [Taskbar Extensions](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178479). 下图显示了 Windows Media Player 的跳转列表，其中包含 "**任务**" 和 "**常用**" 类别中的项。The following illustration shows the Jump List for Windows Media Player, with items in the **Tasks** and **Frequent** categories. ![Windows Media Player 跳转列表](~/add/media/wpfshell-jumplist.png "Windows Media Player 跳跃菜单")![Windows Media Player Jump List](~/add/media/wpfshell-jumplist.png "Windows Media Player Jump List") Windows Media Player 跳跃菜单Windows Media Player Jump List ## 配置跳转列表Configuring a Jump List 跳转列表可以包含两种类型的项： 和 。Jump Lists can contain two types of items, a and a . 是指向程序的链接， 是指向文件的链接。A is a link to a program and a is a link to a file. 您可以通过创建没有 并 指定的 ，直观地分隔跳转列表中的项。You can visually separate items in a Jump List by creating a that does not have a and specified. 此空 将在跳转列表中显示为水平线。This empty will be displayed as a horizontal line in the Jump List. > [!NOTE] > 如果未向应用程序注册 中指定的文件类型，则该文件将不会显示在跳转列表中。If the type of the file specified in a is not registered with your application, the file will not appear in the Jump List. 例如，如果添加指向 .txt 文件的 ，则必须注册应用程序以处理 .txt 文件。For example, if you add a that points to a .txt file, your application must be registered to handle .txt files. 有关详细信息，请参阅[文件关联简介](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178480)。For more information, see [Introduction to File Associations](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178480). 跳转项置于 的类别中。Jump items are placed into categories in the . 默认情况下， 显示在“任务”类别中。By default, a is displayed in the **Tasks** category. 或者，您可以为 指定 。Alternatively, you can specify a for the . 通过设置 和 属性，可以指定是否在 中显示标准的**最近**和**频繁**的类别。You can specify whether the standard **Recent** and **Frequent** categories are displayed in the by setting the and properties. 这些类别的内容由 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell 管理。The contents of these categories are managed by the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell. 由于这些类别可能包含很多相同的数据，因此你通常会在 中显示其中一种，但不能同时显示两者。Because these categories might contain much of the same data, you typically display one or the other in your , but not both. 如果通过公共文件对话框打开最近的项，或通过文件类型关联来打开应用程序，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 会自动管理这些项。[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] automatically manages recent items if they are opened through a common file dialog box or used to open an application through file type association. 通过跳转列表访问项时，可以通过调用 方法通知 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell 将该项添加到**最近**的类别。When an item is accessed through the Jump List, you can notify the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell to add the item to the **Recent** category by calling the method. ## 将跳转列表应用于 Windows ShellApplying a Jump List to the Windows Shell 不能直接访问 shell 的跳转列表，也不能将其内容读入到 类中。You cannot access the shell's Jump List directly or read its contents into the class. 相反， 类提供可以使用的跳转列表的表示形式，然后应用于 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell。Instead, the class provides a representation of a Jump List that you can work with, and then apply to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell. 通常创建一个 并在应用程序首次运行时将其设置一次。You typically create a and set it one time when the application is first run. 不过，您可以在运行时修改或替换 。However, you can modify or replace the at run time. 设置 属性后，必须先将 应用到 Windows shell，然后它的内容才会显示在任务栏跳转列表中。When you have set the properties, you must apply the to the Windows shell before its contents appear in the taskbar Jump List. 当 首次附加到应用程序时（在 XAML 中或在调用 方法时），将自动执行此操作。This is done automatically when the is first attached to an application, either in XAML or in a call to the method. 如果在运行时修改 的内容，则必须调用 方法将其当前内容应用到 Windows shell。If you modify the contents of the at run time, you must call the method to apply its current contents to the Windows shell. ## 在 XAML 中设置跳转列表Setting a Jump List in XAML 不会自动附加到 对象。A is not automatically attached to an object. 通过使用附加的属性语法，可以在 XAML 中将 附加到 对象。You attach a to an object in XAML by using the attached property syntax. 类实现 接口以支持 的 XAML 声明。The class implements the interface to support XAML declaration of a . 如果 在 XAML 中声明并附加到当前 ，则在初始化该 时，它会自动应用到 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell。If the is declared in XAML and attached to the current , it is automatically applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell when the is initialized. ## 设置和修改代码中的跳转列表Setting and Modifying a Jump List in Code 通过调用静态 方法，在代码中将 附加到 对象。You attach a to an object in code by calling the static method. 这还会将 应用到 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell。This also applies the to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell. 若要在运行时修改 ，请调用 方法以获取当前附加到 的 。To modify a at run time, you call the method to get the that is currently attached to an . 在修改了 的属性后，必须调用 方法将更改应用到 Windows shell。After you have modified the properties of the , you must call the method to apply the changes to the Windows shell. > [!NOTE] > 通常会创建一个附加到 并应用于 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell 的 。You typically create one that is attached to the and applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell. 但是，可以创建多个 对象。However, you can create multiple objects. 一次只能将一个 应用于 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell，一次只能将一个 与 关联。Only one at a time can be applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell, and only one at a time can be associated with an . .NET Framework 不要求这些是相同的 。The .NET Framework does not require that these be the same . > [!NOTE] > 此类包含类级别的链接要求，该请求应用于所有成员。This class contains a link demand at the class level that applies to all members. 当直接调用方不具有完全信任权限时，将引发 。A is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接要求](/dotnet/framework/misc/link-demands)和[继承要求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For more information about security demands, see [Link Demands](/dotnet/framework/misc/link-demands) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示具有跳转列表的应用程序。The following example shows an application with a Jump List. 该应用程序有三个按钮，可用于向当前跳转列表中添加任务，清除 "跳转列表" 的内容，并将新的跳转列表应用于应用程序。The application has three buttons that enable you to add a task to the current Jump List, clear the contents of the Jump List, and apply a new Jump List to the application. 下面的示例演示如何在标记中声明 。The following example shows how to declare a in markup. 包含两个 链接和一个 。The contains two links and one . 如果未注册应用程序来处理 .txt 文件扩展名，则将 应用到 shell 将会失败。Applying the to the shell will fail if the application is not registered to handle the .txt file name extension. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#000](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#000)] 下面的示例演示了 `App.xaml`的代码隐藏页。The following example shows the code-behind page for `App.xaml`. 此代码处理 和 事件。This code handles the and events. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml.cs#100)] 下面的示例演示用于创建应用程序用户界面的标记。The following example shows the markup used to create the application user interface. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#300](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#300)] 下面的示例演示了 `MainWindow.xaml`的代码隐藏页。The following example shows the code-behind page for `MainWindow.xaml`. 此代码演示如何在程序代码中修改、清除和创建 。This code demonstrates how to modify, clear, and create a in procedural code. 对于新的跳转列表，将调用静态 方法，将 与当前应用程序相关联，并将 应用于 Windows shell。For the new Jump List, the static method is called to associate the with the current application and apply the to the Windows shell. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#200](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#200)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks **最近**和**频繁**的类别通常包含多个相同的跳转项。The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items. 因此，应用程序通常会在跳转列表中显示 "**最近**" 或 "**常用**" 类别，但不能同时显示两者。As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both.

summary.span: 将指定的项添加到跳转列表的“最近”类别中。

span.span: Adds the specified item to the **Recent** category of the Jump List.

param.name: itemPath
param.span: 要添加到跳转列表中的路径。

span.span: The path to add to the Jump List.

summary.span: 将指定的项路径添加到跳转列表的“最近”类别中。

span.span: Adds the specified item path to the **Recent** category of the Jump List.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **最新**类别的内容由 Windows shell 管理。The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell. 若要在跳转列表中显示最近使用过的项，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To display recently used items in the Jump List, set the property to `true`. 可以调用 方法，以请求 Windows shell 将项路径添加到 "**最近使用**的项" 列表中。You can call the method to request that the Windows shell add an item path to the **Recent** items list. 如果你的应用程序未注册为处理该项的文件类型，则它将不会出现在 "**最近**" 列表中，并且对 的调用将以静默方式失败。If your application is not registered to handle the file type of the item, it will not appear in the **Recent** list and calls to will fail silently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **最新**类别的内容由 Windows shell 管理。The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell. 若要在跳转列表中显示最近使用过的项，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To display recently used items in the Jump List, set the property to `true`. 可以调用 方法来请求 Windows shell 将指定的跳转路径添加到**最近使用**的项列表。You can call the method to request that the Windows shell add the specified jump path to the **Recent** items list. 如果你的应用程序未注册为处理该项的文件类型，则它将不会出现在 "**最近**" 列表中，并且对 的调用将以静默方式失败。If your application is not registered to handle the file type of the item, it will not appear in the **Recent** list and calls to will fail silently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **最新**类别的内容由 Windows shell 管理。The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell. 若要在跳转列表中显示最近使用过的项，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To display recently used items in the Jump List, set the property to `true`. 可以调用 方法，以请求 Windows shell 将指定的跳转任务添加到**最近使用**的项列表。You can call the method to request that the Windows shell add the specified jump task to the **Recent** items list.

summary.span: 在其当前状态下将 发送到 Windows shell 中。

span.span: Sends the to the Windows shell in its current state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将 的内容发送到 Windows shell 的当前状态。The method sends the content of the to the Windows shell in its current state. 完成此调用后，将修改 属性，使其只包含 Windows shell 成功添加到其任务栏跳转列表中的那些项。After this call is complete, the property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its taskbar Jump List. 可以通过事件处理程序为 和 事件访问已删除项的列表。You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the and events. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取当前 并清除 集合的内容。The following example shows how to get the current and clear the contents of the collection. 然后调用 方法，将 更改应用于 Windows shell。The method is then called to apply the changes to the Windows shell. 此示例是 类概述中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#230](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#230)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以调用 方法获取当前与 关联的 。You can call the method to get the currently associated with an . .NET Framework 不需要此为当前应用于 Windows shell 的 。The .NET Framework does not require that this be the that is currently applied to the Windows shell. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取与当前应用程序关联的 。The following example shows how to get the associated with the current application. 将添加到 集合并添加到**最近**的类别。A is added to the collection and added to the **Recent** category. 调用 方法，将更新的 应用到 Windows shell。The method is called to apply the updated to the Windows shell. 此示例是 类概述中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property JumpItems As List(Of JumpItem)

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取在跳转列表中显示的 对象的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of objects that are displayed in the Jump List.

value.span: 在跳转列表中显示的 对象的集合。

span.span: The collection of objects displayed in the Jump List.
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跳转列表可以包含两种类型的项： 和 。Jump Lists can contain two types of items, a and a . 是指向程序的链接， 是指向文件的链接。A is a link to a program and a is a link to a file. 创建 时， 集合为空。When a is created, the collection is empty. 可以将任何 或 对象添加到集合中。You can add any or objects to the collection. 集合将只包含程序添加的项。The collection will only contain items that have been added by your program. 通过成功调用 或 方法将 传递到 Windows shell 后， 集合将仅包含已成功添加到任务栏跳转列表中的项。After the has been passed to the Windows shell by a successful call to either the or methods, the collection will contain only the items that were successfully added to the taskbar Jump List. 将从 集合中删除未成功添加的项。Items that were not successfully added are removed from the collection. 可以通过事件处理程序为 和 事件访问已删除项的列表。You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the and events. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取当前 并清除 集合的内容。The following example shows how to get the current and clear the contents of the collection. 然后调用 方法，将 更改应用于 Windows shell。The method is then called to apply the changes to the Windows shell. 此示例是 类概述中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#230](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#230)]

summary.span: 在 Windows shell 将跳转项添加到跳转列表中失败时发生。

span.span: Occurs when jump items are not successfully added to the Jump List by the Windows shell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 的内容应用到 Windows shell 后， 属性将修改为仅包含 Windows shell 成功添加到其跳转列表中的那些项。After the contents of the are applied to the Windows shell, the property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its Jump List. 可以通过事件处理程序为 和 事件访问已删除项的列表。You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the and events. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理 事件以便在消息框中显示拒绝的项。The following example shows how to handle the event to display the rejected items in a message box. 此示例是 类概述中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#110](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml.cs#110)]

span.span: Occurs when jump items previously in the Jump List are removed from the list by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 的内容应用到 Windows shell 后， 属性将修改为仅包含 Windows shell 成功添加到其跳转列表中的那些项。After the contents of the are applied to the Windows shell, the property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its Jump List. 可以通过事件处理程序为 和 事件访问已删除项的列表。You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the and events. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理 事件以便在消息框中显示拒绝的项。The following example shows how to handle the event to display the rejected items in a message box. 此示例是 类概述中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以创建多个 对象。You can create multiple objects. 但是，一次只能有一个 与 相关联。However, only one at a time can be associated with an . 调用 方法，设置当前与 关联的 。Call the method to set the currently associated with an . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在代码中创建 。The following example shows how to create a in code. 调用静态 方法，将 与当前应用程序相关联。The static method is called to associate the with the current application. 设置后，会自动将 应用到 Windows shell。The is automatically applied to the Windows shell when it is set. 此示例是 类概述中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示常用项是否显示在跳转列表中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether frequently used items are displayed in the Jump List.

value.span: 如果常用项显示在跳转列表中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if frequently used items are displayed in the Jump List; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks **常见**类别的内容由 Windows shell 管理。The contents of the **Frequent** category are managed by the Windows shell. 若要在跳转列表中显示常用项，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To display frequently used items in the Jump List, set the property to `true`. **最近**和**频繁**的类别通常包含多个相同的跳转项。The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items. 因此，应用程序通常会在跳转列表中显示 "**最近**" 或 "**常用**" 类别，但不能同时显示两者。As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个配置为显示**常用**类别的 。The following example shows a configured to show the **Frequent** category. 此示例是 类概述中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#001](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#001)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示最近使用的项是否显示在跳转列表中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether recently used items are displayed in the Jump List.

value.span: 如果最近使用的项显示在跳转列表中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if recently used items are displayed in the Jump List; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks **最新**类别的内容由 Windows shell 管理。The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell. 若要在跳转列表中显示常用项，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To display frequently used items in the Jump List, set the property to `true`. **最近**和**频繁**的类别通常包含多个相同的跳转项。The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items. 因此，应用程序通常会在跳转列表中显示 "**最近**" 或 "**常用**" 类别，但不能同时显示两者。As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both. 可以调用 方法来请求 Windows shell 将项添加到**最近使用**的项列表。You can call the method to request that the Windows shell add items to the **Recent** items list. 如果你的应用程序未注册为处理该项的文件名类型，则它将不会出现在 "**最近**" 列表中，并且对 的调用会以静默方式失败。If your application is not registered to handle the file name type of the item, it will not appear in the **Recent** list and calls to will fail silently. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个配置为显示 "**最近**" 类别的 。The following example shows a configured to show the **Recent** category. 此示例是 类概述中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#001](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#001)]
